short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control an HTML Element with a MIDI input

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web MIDI Mapper allows you to map a MIDI input to an element on a website. You can then use the MIDI input to click said element without having to focus the tab or browser. It was originally developed to be able to control the play button of a tutorial video without having to switch focus.
